pull.title: refactor: followup of remove -deprecatedrpc=addresses flag
pull.body: I've cherry-picked some of the commits out of #22924, and made minor changes (like fixing named args).

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24661](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24661) (refactor: Use clang-tidy syntax for C++ named arguments by fanquake)
* [#23599](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23599) (Tidy up RPCTxSerializationFlags by MarcoFalke)
* [#23319](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23319) (rpc: Return fee and prevout (utxos) to getrawtransaction by dougEfresh)
* [#21283](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21283) (Implement BIP 370 PSBTv2 by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
